root.name: Deus Ex: Human Revolution - The Missing Link
root.description: Deus Ex: Human Revolution - The Missing Link is a DLC (downloadable content) for Deus Ex: Human Revolution. Despite being set in the middle of the story, the DLC can only be started separately; the main game still skips the DLC content during a regular playthrough. It is set after the events in China when Adam Jensen went as stowaway on a ship. The original game blends out for three days and this add-on tells what happened during this time. Jensen finds himself captured on a Belltower ship, ready to be tortured. Fortunately a mysterious hacker frees him and now Jensen needs to uncover the conspiracies of his surroundings.
